::JetV::
JetV burned off through the streets unti reaching a heap of scraps. He
picked up one  scrap and hte entire mound lifted up revealing the
secret chamber holding thier ship.
"Femmes first" he siad politely gesturing don the hole.

> > > come

> > > frowns
> > > > > at the

> that he
> > > > > will
> > > > > > > > > bring along. He looks about his room for the last
> > > > > > > time, "Farewell,"
> > > > > > > > > He grabs his strategy papers and journals, puts them
> into
> > > a
> > > > > > > > > compartment, and exits the building. He transforms
> > > into 'cycle
> > > > > > > > > mode and heads toward the secret ship. He opens a
> > > commlink to
> > > > > > > > > JetV, "JetV, this is Crossroads, what's up? I'm
> heading
> > > to the
> > > > > > > ship.

> when
> > > you
> > > > > > > > > travel there... all would be lost if that were to
> happen.
> > > > > > > Crossroads
> > > > > > > > > out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts off a
> cuts
> > > off a
> > > > > Pred
> > > > > > > > > freighter, showing them his feelings. The unkind words
> > > coming
> > > > > from
> > > > > > > > > the freighter proved that the feelings were mutual.

> > > can
> > > > > be

> > > > > down,
> > > > > > > to see

> > > > > > > > > > smashed his desk, and was standing at his full

> > > very

> > > of us

> > > > > just
> > > > > > > above
